body.text: Applications can send a card the same way they send messages, via the [Webex Teams /messages API](https://developer.webex.com/docs/api/v1/messages/create-a-message).

A message request body to send a card looks very much like a "regular" message request, except that the request body will include an “attachment” attribute which includes data that tells Webex how to render a card.
